mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bms_sensor ( CREATE_TIME, SERIAL_NUM, SENSOR_TYPE, SENSOR_ADDR ) VALUES ( CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{serialNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sensorType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sensorAddr, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bms_sensor SET MODIFY_TIME = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, USER_ID = #{userId} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT ID, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, VERSION, SERIAL_NUM, SENSOR_TYPE, SENSOR_ADDR, USER_ID FROM bms_sensor WHERE USER_ID=#{userid}
